DOC.detailed_description: This 2-group , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 14-week study ( N=100 ) investigate efficacy cognitive behavioral therapy plus lisdexamfetamine vs. placebo treat cocaine dependence . We hypothesize lisdexamfetamine reduce cocaine use ( primary outcome ) , well cocaine crave impulsivity ( secondary outcome ) vs. placebo .
